standard_metadata.standard_description: Interpret and compute quotients of fractions, and solve word problems involving division of fractions by fractions, e.g., by using visual fraction models and equations to represent the problem.

hints.content: We want to know how many groups of $\blueE{\dfrac{8}{3}}$ are in $\maroonD{\dfrac{3}{2}}$.  The **[[☃ definition 1]]** of $\blueE{\dfrac{8}{3}}$ tells us the number of groups of $\blueE{\dfrac{8}{3}}$ in $1$ whole.  We have $\maroonD{\dfrac{3}{2}}$ wholes, so we can multiply the reciprocal of $\blueE{\dfrac{8}{3}}$ by $\maroonD{\dfrac{3}{2}}$.  [[☃ explanation 1]]
